description:
This newly renovated apartment is the entire first floor of a brick row house in Brooklyn and backyard with grill. It has a fully furnished private kitchen and bathroom with an extra deep soaking tub and rainfall shower head. There are 3 subway lines about a 12 minute walk away that provide easy transportation options.

You’ll love our place because of the outdoors space, the comfy bed, and the ambiance. It's good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).

This 1000 sq ft apartment has one large bedroom with a queen sized bed. There is also a lounge chair in the bedroom that is fairly comfortable for sleeping if needed. The living room is very spacious and has a couch and plenty of room for the 2 twin air beds we have that you are welcome to use.

The kitchen and bathroom are newly renovated and have all the amenities to ensure you have a comfortable stay.

You will have private access to the entire floor of the house, as well as the backyard.

There are many shops, delis and restaurants within easy walking distance.

There are 3 subway lines (The A/C as well as the 3 and the 4 trains) that are within easy walking distance that give you many options for easy travel throughout NYC,
name: Private Brooklyn Apartment and Garden
review: Excellent hosts! and lovely apartment, it has everything you will possible need: impeccable kitchen, great bed, nice garden! we greatly recommend this place. Thanks Jenny and Scott, you made our stay in NYC very enjoyable!!!!
